meaning_str.bing:
n. 阶段；步；步骤；戏剧
v. 举行；上演；举办；组织
网络. 舞台；级；时期

舞台；时期；步骤；戏剧；剧场；演出场所；表演；展示平台；发射阶段；发展期；发育阶段
上演（戏剧、表演）；筹划；举行（活动、比赛、抗议等）；使发生（尤指为引起关注的事件）

1.en: 'To me, it was all like he was on stage, ' Ms. Fineman says, comparing the interview to a performance.
1.cn: 范恩曼说，在我看来，他就像是在舞台上表演。她将对马多夫的访问比作一场表演。

2.en: Once he lost, the dramatic defeat led many -- including me -- to report that this was obviously a blow on the international stage.
2.cn: 这场意料之外的失败使得大量的报道——包括我的报道——认为这是他在国际舞台的重大失误。

3.en: despite of the fact that this may later on cause internal conflict of interests at a later stage.
3.cn: 尽管这些可能后来就成为家族企业内部利益纠纷的缘由。

0.en: Sir? Yes? And what would be the next stage?
0.cn: 不好意思。请说。下一个阶段呢？

1.en: I went through that stage and now I'm going through the stage of missing the game.
1.cn: 我已经熬过那个时期了，现在我正在经历想念赛场的阶段。

2.en: Stage two of training is where you are most at risk.
2.cn: 第二阶段的训练是你最危险的时期。

3.en: Well, the next stage would probably be control of other people.
3.cn: 下一阶段可能是控制他人。

4.en: This first stage would give us access to and control over our own body.
4.cn: 在这第一阶段，我们可以尽情发挥并控制自己的身体。

5.en: At the end of each stage of training, the lowestranking initiates will be leaving us.
5.cn: 训练的每个阶段，排名倒数的新生们将会离开无畏派。

6.en: My brother was like you. During the second stage, he got good really fast.
6.cn: 我弟弟和你一样，在第二阶段训练的时候，他很快就能逃出来。

7.en: We already are. We're the next stage of human evolution. You said it yourself!
7.cn: 我们已经是了。我们是人类进化的下一阶段，你自己也这么说！

8.en: Alrighty. We're gonna start with some basic third stage breathing exercises, so Mummies, why don't you get on your back?
8.cn: 首先是第三阶段基本呼吸练习，各位妈妈请躺下。

9.en: Honey, how are you feeling? The book says at this stage of the pregnancy morning sickness should be going away. So that's good news, right?
9.cn: 亲爱的，你还好吗？书上说怀孕到了这个阶段，晨吐的症状应该会没了。这算好消息吧？

10.en: I'm now at a stage in my own life in which it is much more important to me to pass along what I've learned about how to be successful than to seek more success for myself.
10.cn: 我现在的生活阶段对我更重要的是，将我所学到的成功的知识传递下去，而不是自己追寻成功。

11.en: Ted Hendricks. Managing director of the transition. Never fun, this stage. But we do have ahead of us the privilege of publishing what will be the very last issue of LIFE magazine.
11.cn: 泰德·亨德里克斯，过渡期主任。这个阶段一点都不有趣，现今我们最重要的一件事，就是我们最后一期的生活周刊特辑。

13.en: Do you know where you will stage this festivity?

14.en: Beijing is an important player on the global stage.
14.cn: 北京是国际舞台上一个重要的选手。

15.en: Bring a bottle of water on stage if you're allowed.
15.cn: 如果可以的话，带一瓶水上台。

16.en: Get your stick and get your fucking ass on the stage. On stage.
16.cn: 拿好槌子滚上台。去上台。

17.en: Now, if he's center stage on this, he can't fault my performance, because we're sharing the stage together.
17.cn: 如果他在这个舞台的中央，他就不能挑我的刺，因为我们要共享这个舞台。

18.en: Now get your stick and get your ass on the stage. I can't.
18.cn: 拿好鼓槌滚上台去。我不行。

19.en: I assume you're going to give me an explanation at some stage.
